description:
My place is close to all the best restaurants, nightlife, cafes, and shopping New York City has to offer. Soho, Little Italy, Nolita are all steps away. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Private full 1 bedroom apartment with everything you could possibly need. Queen size bed, full bathroom with tub, full kitchen. Safe and fun neighborhood.

Near the B,D,F, 6,Q,R (all under a 10min walk)
name: 1 bedroom APT in NOLITA/SOHO
